moods.name: Excited
moods.description: Feeling enthusiastic and thrilled about something.

moods.name: Energetic
moods.description: Full of energy and vitality.

moods.name: Enthusiastic
moods.description: Showing great excitement and interest in something.

moods.name: Joyful
moods.description: Experiencing great happiness and delight.

moods.name: Happy
moods.description: Feeling content and satisfied with life.

moods.name: Content
moods.description: Experiencing a sense of peaceful satisfaction.

moods.name: Optimistic
moods.description: Having a positive outlook on life and future events.

moods.name: Inspired
moods.description: Feeling motivated and creatively stimulated.

moods.name: Elated
moods.description: Overjoyed and ecstatic about something.

moods.name: Ecstatic
moods.description: Experiencing extreme happiness and excitement.

moods.name: Agitated
moods.description: Feeling annoyed and irritated.

moods.name: Irritated
moods.description: Experiencing annoyance and frustration.

moods.name: Anxious
moods.description: Feeling nervous and worried about something.

moods.name: Restless
moods.description: Unable to relax or be still, often due to anxiety or stress.

moods.name: Frustrated
moods.description: Feeling annoyed and discouraged due to obstacles or difficulties.

moods.name: Overwhelmed
moods.description: Feeling intensely burdened or swamped by emotions or tasks.

moods.name: Stressed
moods.description: Experiencing mental or emotional strain and tension.

moods.name: Angry
moods.description: Feeling intense displeasure and resentment.

moods.name: Tense
moods.description: Experiencing mental or muscle strain and uneasiness.

moods.name: Nervous
moods.description: Feeling uneasy and apprehensive about something.

moods.name: Relaxed
moods.description: Feeling calm and free from stress or tension.

moods.name: Calm
moods.description: Experiencing a state of tranquility and peace.

moods.name: Serene
moods.description: Feeling calm, untroubled, and at ease.

moods.name: Peaceful
moods.description: Experiencing a state of harmony and tranquility.

moods.name: Tranquil
moods.description: Feeling calm and peaceful like a serene landscape.

moods.name: Contented
moods.description: Experiencing a sense of satisfaction and happiness.

moods.name: Meditative
moods.description: Engaged in deep contemplation and self-reflection.

moods.name: Reflective
moods.description: Thoughtful and contemplative about one's experiences and feelings.

moods.name: Satisfied
moods.description: Feeling content and fulfilled with one's current state.

moods.name: Grateful
moods.description: Feeling thankful and appreciative for what one has.

moods.name: Sad
moods.description: Feeling unhappy and sorrowful.

moods.name: Depressed
moods.description: Experiencing a state of severe sadness and hopelessness.

moods.name: Melancholic
moods.description: Feeling a deep and prolonged sadness.

moods.name: Lonely
moods.description: Feeling isolated and lacking companionship.

moods.name: Bored
moods.description: Experiencing a lack of interest or excitement.

moods.name: Apathetic
moods.description: Feeling indifferent and lacking enthusiasm.

moods.name: Disappointed
moods.description: Feeling let down and unsatisfied.

moods.name: Dull
moods.description: Lacking interest and excitement, feeling boring.

moods.name: Tired
moods.description: Feeling exhausted and lacking energy.

moods.name: Unmotivated
moods.description: Lacking motivation and enthusiasm.
